mapper.select: SELECT start_date FROM user_tb where user_id=#{user_id};
SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_pw, u.start_date, m.money_id, m.price, m.category, m.use_date FROM user_tb u, money_tb m WHERE 1=1 AND u.user_id=m.user_id ORDER BY use_date DESC;

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_pw, u.start_date, m.money_id, m.price, m.category, m.use_date FROM user_tb u, money_tb m WHERE 1=1 and u.user_id=m.user_id and u.user_id= #{user_id} and date_format(concat(#{selectYear},"-1-1"),'%y-%c-%d') <= use_date and date_format(concat(#{selectYear},"-12-31"),'%y-%c-%d') >= use_date ORDER BY use_date DESC;

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_pw, u.start_date, m.money_id, m.price, m.category, m.use_date FROM user_tb u, money_tb m WHERE 1=1 and u.user_id=m.user_id and u.user_id= #{user_id} and #{search_start} <=use_date and use_date <= #{search_end} ORDER BY use_date DESC;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM money_tb WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND money_id IN (#{money_id});
